title: Cant get into game
body: Im stuck at reconnect screen.Happened 2 times in a row.Just dont get me leaverbuster for you fault.I dont like this new client at all and you should never changed it.It was way too rushed and atleast 10 times in a month we have issues whether its globally or for 1 person.

replies.body: If you're not able to reconnect then it's most likely either an issue with your network settings or possibly a hiccup with your ISP. If you still can't get logged back in, test some basic troubleshooting first by following this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Make sure to do the steps on port forwarding and flushing your DNS as those two can give you a much cleaner connection to our servers.
